text: adamâ€Œra santatigale, saitananu nim'ma tande tayiyannu svargadinda hora hakisidante (hagu) avara melinda avara udugegalannu kalacisi avara manada bhagagalannu avara munde prakatapadisidante avanu nim'mannu darigedisadirali. Khanditavagiyu, avanu mattu avana pangadadavaru, nimage avarannu nodalagada kadeyinda, nim'mannu noduttiruttare. Navantu saitanarannu, visvasigalalladavara posakaragisiddeve
